author: daxian-dbw
body: @TravisEz13, please submit PR (or just push directly 😄) for the doc/script changes you need to do before this release.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Ignore the Travis CI failures for now. Travis CI fails because the packages are not yet published. I will rerun those builds once we published the release.

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: Does .spelling need an update as well?

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @mirichmo yes it needs to be updated. I will do that once Travis finishes his doc changes and pushes to this PR.

title: Alpha.18 release doc updates
